name: REDCap RAG AI Chatbot
description: Prototype module for REDCap-RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) AI Integration. Currently working towards using OpenAI to allow users to integrate external knowledge bases (i.e. Files inside REDCap folders) during the response generation process.

project-settings.name: REDCap Folder (external source) to utilize to generate response

API Model Version
(Example models for Azure-hosted OpenAI: 2024-02-01, 2024-08-01-preview.)

Text to prepend to a question (Optional).
(Example: "Summarize the response in 150 words or less.")
Refer strictly to the uploaded file to provide response

Custom message to display in response if answer is not a part of any files
If empty, it will default to "Sorry, We are unable to provide any information based on this question.".
project-settings.default: Sorry, We are unable to provide any information based on this question.
